announcements.title: The Cathedral will resume regular Mass Schedule as of February 16th, 2021. Mass times below.
announcements.descriptive:
Due to Covid-19, we will be resuming our previous Mass Schedule at 30% capacity.
Our schedule will continue to be updated.

Parishioners are asked to review
[Worship Safe in Pictures and Points](http://peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGe…).

The televised Sunday Mass will continue on YouTube.
Check [Special events](#schedule2) below for information and links.

announcements.title: Join our mailing list
announcements.descriptive:
Be the first to know!
Stay in the loop with everything going on at The Cathedral.

Sign up to receive regular updates, announcements, links to bulletins, and more,
delivered straight to your inbox!

Let's stay connected.

[Sign up...](https://mailchi.mp/ac8e8cadb5e8/dont-miss-out)

announcements.title: Daily Lenten Reflection
announcements.subtitle: March 7, 2021
announcements.descriptive:
The Holy Wrath of God. Reflect, today, upon those parts of your life that Jesus wants to cleanse.

Allow Him to speak directly and firmly to you so that you will be driven to repentance.  The Lord loves you with a perfect love and desires that all sin in your life be cleansed.

Let us Pray… Lord, I know that I am a sinner who is in need of Your mercy and, at times, in need of Your holy wrath.  Help me to humbly receive Your rebukes of love and to allow You to drive all sin from my life.

Have mercy on me, dear Lord. Please have mercy. - Fr. Joshy George
